Monitor

Aerodial also has a feature for monitoring value changes. Use addMonitor() to add components.

{% endblock %} {% block content %}

Multiline

multiline option provides multiline log components.

var aero = new Aerodial();
aero.addMonitor(PARAMS, 'wave', {
  multiline: true,
});

Count

You can use the count option to change a buffer size.

var aero = new Aerodial();
aero.addMonitor(PARAMS, 'wave', {
  count: 10,
});

Interval

To change the interval of monitors, set the interval option in milliseconds. The default value is 200(ms).

var aero = new Aerodial();
aero.addMonitor(PARAMS, 'time', {
  interval: 1000,
});

Graph

{type: 'graph'} option for number parameters provides a graph component. Pass min and max for a value range.

var aero = new Aerodial();
aero.addMonitor(PARAMS, 'wave', {
  type: 'graph',
  min: -1,
  max: +1,
});
{% endblock %}
